name: ArtDirection
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: art direction
des: Are you a designer working from home? Do you miss having an Art Director hovering over your shoulder and giving you passive aggressive and vague critiques? Now you can ask Alexa for the same frustrating art direction and feel like you're working in a studio.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
